resources.string: To properly test the solutions in this app, you need to enable \"Don\'t keep activities\", which is a system developer setting. \n\nOpen \"About phone\" in Settings, then scroll down to the bottom of the page and tap \"Build number\" seven times, or until developer options are enabled. Then return here.
This is required to properly test the solutions presented in this app. \n\nOpen \"Developer options\" and then toggle on \"Don\'t keep activities\" at the bottom of the page, then return here.
This approach will run the callback regardless of whether the activity is running. \n\nThis won\'t work if the activity is destroyed - the task won\'t have a reference to the new activity.

This approach will run the callback if the activity is running, but if it\'s not running it will save the result to disk so the activity can read it in onStart(). \n\nThis won\'t work if the activity is re-created before the task completes - the task won\'t have a reference to the new activity.
